creator: cmedappa@icope.com
text:
This bug occurs only on windows 2000(Works on NT4.0). Ant hangs when it calls 
java2iiop to compile borland stubs. Actually i think i have found the cause of 
the problem. When the deployment descriptor's are processed ,if ANT tries to 
process ejb-inprise.xml first and ejb-jar.xml second then this bug is 
occurs.The fix would be to make ant process the ejb-jar.xml first then continue 
with other.
I tried out a fast fix and it started working , i din't research much as i had 
a tight schedule. Below is the snipet of code from 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.ejb.EjbJar.java after fix


            DirectoryScanner ds = getDirectoryScanner(config.descriptorDir);
            ds.scan();
            String[] files = ds.getIncludedFiles();
            **********************************************************
                           FIX START
            **********************************************************
            int ePos=-1;
            for (int index = 0; index < files.length; ++index) {
				if(files[index].equals("ejb-jar.xml")){
					ePos=index;
					break;
				}
			}

		    if(ePos>0){
				String temp=files[0];
				files[0]=files[ePos];
				files[ePos]=temp;
			}
            **********************************************************
                           FIX END
            **********************************************************


            log(files.length + " deployment descriptors located.",
                Project.MSG_VERBOSE);


Steps To reproduce :
--------------------
Just make a build.xml for any ejb and use ANT to make ejb.jar and ejbclient.jar

THE DEBUG OUTPUT WHEN IT HANGS
------------------------------
